title: Implement Google Drive download provider + year selection
description: Add minimal DownloadProvider interface and Google Drive implementation to list files, map year-based filenames to IDs, and select current+previous year (configurable).
notes: Added DownloadProvider + RemoteFile, Google Drive folder parser/provider, and year selection with unit tests.
close_reason: Google Drive provider and year selection implemented.

title: Scaffold Spring Boot/Gradle skeleton
description: Create initial Gradle + Spring Boot structure mirroring lol-ddragon-snapshot-cron; add entrypoint and basic test harness. TDD where applicable.
notes: Copied Gradle wrapper/config, set rootProject name, added Spring Boot app class and test skeleton.

title: Define config surface + document defaults
description: Define config keys (source URL, output dir, temp dir, manifest, user agent/timeouts, years to fetch), document defaults and output layout; keep KISS/YAGNI.
notes: Added README config section and created ProDataDownloadProperties with defaults.
close_reason: Config surface documented and properties class added.

title: Atomic publish + per-year manifest writer
description: Implement atomic replace per year and optional manifest (.manifest.json) with TDD unit tests for checksum/row_count.
notes: Added AtomicFilePublisher, DownloadManifest, ManifestWriter with TDD tests for publishing and manifests.
close_reason: Atomic publish and manifest writer implemented with tests.

title: Wire cron flow + logging/exit codes + integration tests
description: Wire download -> validate -> publish per year, add logs and non-zero exits, and integration tests for multi-year publish.
notes: Wired download job, runner, Spring config beans, logging/exit codes, integration test; gradle_safe test passes.
close_reason: Cron wiring and integration tests complete.

title: CSV header validation + TDD unit tests
description: Write failing tests first for required header validation and empty CSV acceptance; implement validator.
notes: Added CsvHeaderValidator with BOM handling and required columns; wrote TDD unit tests.
close_reason: CSV header validation implemented with tests.
